MOC_Api_Service_Interface Interface Reference

Inheritance diagram for MOC_Api_Service_Interface:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

MOC Api Service interface

All service objects has to implement these methods.

It's recommended to extend MOC_Api_Abstract

MOC_Api_Service_Interface::provides ( $  method  ) 

Method invoked by MOC_Api_Service

If the method returns true, the MOC_Api_Service object calls invoke on this object

Returns:
boolean

Implemented in MOC_Api_Abstract, and MOC_Api_Service_Annotation.
